title: How hard are new company startups in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you asking if new company startups are harder to start in 2020 than in other years? If so, then they are no harder or easier than any other year. The answer to the question is not harder or easier but whether you have a product/service that pantloads of people will buy repeatedly instead of the alternatives already on the market. If not, then it’s next to impossible.
